About us

We are a small student group from the University of Deusto working on a class assignment.

About the project

We are working on a file hosting service that provides aditional information about some of it's files.

The repositories:
Server
Client
Vagrant installation

Prog3: We are implementing most of what we are studying in prog3, including networking, recursion, access to databases using java, data structures...

BD2: This project will make use of Neo4j, MongoDB and possibly MySQL (for FTP configuration).

Out intention is to implement the following features:

  • SSL for any interaction with the server
  • Command Line Interface
  • Graphic User Interface
  • Event Logging
  • Clean database usage

Services

FTP file storage

We store, organize and retrieve files using the File Transfer Protocol.

Neo4j

A Neo4j instance is available to retrieve, update and upload any information about files stored in the server.

MongoDB

Used by the server to store configuration files, we're likely to find more usages down the road.

HTTP

Independent HTTP sever for any interaction of the server except for those listed here (FTP, Neo4j...)

SSL

We are trying to implement SSL in most of our communications, and will take a look at Lets Encrypt for CA.

DWH

A data warehouse is used to store anonymous information about the usage of the service.

Server Status monitoring

The server periodically reads information about itself and stores it in a local InfluxDB instance.

Server Status Visualization

A Grafana instance is available to see real-time information about the status of the server.

Suggestions are welcome!
